TopicTitle: Looking for an old Duna mission video I can't seem to find.

Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a Duna mission video that I saw a while back. It was done probably between 8 and 12 months ago. It was a really well-made video (kind of like the Build Fly Dream Trailer) and I know it had

by Steve Jablonsky as one of the background songs. I've scoured youtube for nearly 50 pages of different search results, but I can't seem to find it. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Well... the best Duna Mission Video I know is this one.

But it is porbably not the one you are looking for.
No, that's not it, but I did see that one a lot in my search results.
